pages.text: If you wish to have even more control over the enchantment pieces you are getting, use Enchanting Candles to get luck on your side and influence the outcome. Each candle color brings specific influences to the pieces you are generating (modded enchantments included).$(br)The way it works is quite mysterious, the only information you have are the strange inscriptions that accompany each colored candle:
